title: Mitigating Climate Change Risk in Real Estate
description: Climate change has been declared an “emergency” by Pres. Joe Biden, resulting in increasingly severe weather, rising sea levels and hotter temperatures. How can homeowners and real estate investors access the risks for their properties—and protect them? Join Cal Inman, founder and CEO of ClimateCheck, discuss climate-change risk mitigation in real estate with Mansion Global reporter Leslie Hendrickson.
